name: solana-wallets-generation
title: Solana Wallets Generation
description: Introducing the Solana Wallet Generator, a powerful Raycast extension designed for developers and cryptocurrency enthusiasts seeking to efficiently create multiple Solana wallets. This tool streamlines the wallet generation process, allowing users to produce thousands of wallets swiftly and securely.
author: uladkaminski

commands.name: swg
commands.title: Generate Solana Wallets
commands.subtitle: Create Multiple Solana Wallets
commands.description: Generate multiple Solana wallets with options for public keys and CSV export

preferences.name: defaultWalletCount
preferences.title: Default Number of Wallets
preferences.description: Default number of wallets to generate (1-1000)

preferences.name: includePublicKeys
preferences.title: Include Public Keys
preferences.description: Include public keys in generated wallets by default
preferences.label: Include public keys

preferences.name: saveToHistory
preferences.title: Save to History
preferences.description: Save generated wallets to history by default
preferences.label: Save to history

preferences.name: outputFormat
preferences.title: Output Format
preferences.description: Choose the format for copying wallet data

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
